message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you meet me in the middle at $1350000?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1350000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I can offer it to you for $1400000. What do you think?
